definition: to be a spokesperson/to be an ambassador (for a brand)/to endorse
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Can you name three celebrity endorsers who endorse the sports brand?
sentences.chinese: 請閣下舉出三個運動品牌的代言人？

sentences.english: I will change my perspective towards the personal care product due to the behavior of celebrity endorser.
sentences.chinese: 名人代言人的行爲會影響我對該個人護理產品的看法。

sentences.english: Emilia is the voice of conscience in the play.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉亞在這齣戲中是良知的代言人。

sentences.english: John Terry and Michael Owen of Newcastle endorse the brand.
sentences.chinese: 球員特里和歐文是其廣告代言人。

sentences.english: My father is very humorous, I can say when Walch.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很幽默，說我能當“威露士代言人”。

sentences.english: Today, there are those who claim to have representatives of the Sion strain especially in the U.
sentences.chinese: 如今在美國有着許多擁戴西翁品系的無數代言人。

sentences.english: Do you think the super star need to take the responsibility of the false advertising?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲這些爲虛假廣告代言的明星應該負責任嗎？

sentences.english: Trapani said it was becoming increasingly difficult to find celebrities who were not used by other brands.
sentences.chinese: 特拉帕尼稱，現在很難找到沒替其它品牌代言的明星。

sentences.english: On the one hand, the children who are below ten years old can't be the spokespersons.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，小於十歲的孩子不能成爲代言人。

sentences.english: Hsu Chi has endorsed the famous brand of make-up.
sentences.chinese: 舒淇幫這個知名的化妝品品牌代言。

sentences.english: Kenji Hiranabe is the face of agile in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 平鍋健児在日本差不多是敏捷的代言人。

sentences.english: Celebrity endorser affects my perspective towards the personal care product.
sentences.chinese: 名人代言人能影響我對該個人護理產品的看法。

sentences.english: Celebrity endorsement has become increasingly prevalent in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 名人代言近些年來已變得越來越盛行。

sentences.english: It calls for teachers to speak for it and redeem the world.
sentences.chinese: 它召請上主之師爲它的代言人，來救贖世界。

sentences.english: The Chinese often praise Liu and the basketball star Yao Ming for their modesty.
sentences.chinese: 中國人經常讚美劉翔和姚明爲他們中庸之道的代言人。

sentences.english: It is, after all, Stern's job to speak for the owners during a conflict.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩在衝突中爲球隊老闆代言畢竟是他應盡的本份。

definition: person who represents an organization and enhances its image/ambassador
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
a fashion show/to walk the runway (in a fashion show)
to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
(slang) to cheer sb on/to show one's support/("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")
strong card/honor card (card games)/very popular or successful person/self-important
